description.en:
Topics: research questions, research strategy, finding and analysing evidence based information, data collection methods, data analysis methods, action research, self-analysis, proof of competence, reflection, academic discussion.

Complex exam will be composed with the support of a supervisor. The problem statement is coordinated with supervisor and discussed in the subject of "Evidence based research and development of practice".  The complex exam is written according to the rules and regulations of the Institute of Education.
description.et: Lõpueksam on kahest osast koosnev komplekseksam. Esiteks tuleb koostada vanemõpetaja, tase 7 portfoolio ja teiseks läbi viia tegevusuuring ja selle tulemusi avalikult kaitsta. Portfoolio koostatakse vastavalt õpetajate kutse andja juhistele. Selle koostamist toetatakse lõpueksami seminaris. Tegevusuuringus käsitletakse õppija töökohal olulist probleemi, mis kooskõlastatakse ja arutatakse läbi juhendava õppejõuga. Tegevusuuring koostatakse vastavalt Haridusteaduste instituudis kehtivatele nõuetele. Tegevusuuringu läbiviimise metoodika omandamist toetatakse tõenduspõhise praktika uurimise ja arendamise õppeaines.

objectives.en: The aim is to support learners' knowledge and skills on planning and carrying out action research in the area of inclusive education. Support the analysis and practical application of theoretical knowledge and personal experiences.

learning_outcomes.en: The learner can carry out educational action research (6 ECTS) and to analyse its results; the learner can carry out self-analysis in the context of professional development and composes self-analysis portfolio (9 ECTS).
